entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Clearing this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 this morning and minus 5 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of snow beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
